name: A Date With Markiplier - Twine Adaption
name_original: A Date With Markiplier - Twine Adaption
description:
This is a fan project to compile A Date With Markiplier into one HTML game.

The game only embeds the videos and each video is linked to the original video as uploaded by Markiplier.

A Date With Markiplier is a Video Choose-Your-Own-Adventure made by the channel Markiplier and this adaption makes it easy to play and watch even if Youtube ever changes the end card format.
